name: Memory Studies 003
description: Artist: Patricio Gonzalez Vivo. One of a series of real-time programs meditating on the behavior of memories. Allocated memory is iteratively loaded, sorted, and blurred; during this stage of fragility it suffers progressive deterioration and corruption. Once it achieves a maximum state of order or entropy, new memories are allocated and loaded to restart the cycle again. NFT includes: real-time generative program written in C++ and GLSL compiled for the browser as a web assembly piece, resolution adapts to canvas size, duration indefinite, 2021, edition of 10.
